atbat.des: Freddy Sanchez grounds out, second baseman Alexi Casilla to first baseman Justin Morneau.

action.des: Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Quincy Latimore replaces Nate McLouth.

atbat.des: Quincy Latimore singles on a line drive to left fielder Delmon Young.
Ryan Doumit grounds into double play, third baseman Joe Crede to second baseman Alexi Casilla to first baseman Justin Morneau. Quincy Latimore out at 2nd.

action.des: Defensive Substitution: James Boone replaces left fielder Nyjer Morgan, batting 1st, playing left field.
Defensive Substitution: Ramon Vazquez replaces second baseman Freddy Sanchez, batting 2nd, playing second base.
Quincy Latimore remains in the game as the center fielder.
Defensive Substitution: Jason Jaramillo replaces catcher Ryan Doumit, batting 4th, playing catcher.
Defensive Substitution: Larry Broadway replaces first baseman Adam LaRoche, batting 5th, playing first base.
Defensive Substitution: Jason Delaney replaces right fielder Brandon Moss, batting 7th, playing right field.
Defensive Substitution: Eddie Prasch replaces third baseman Andy LaRoche, batting 8th, playing third base.
Defensive Substitution: Luis Cruz replaces shortstop Jack Wilson, batting 9th, playing shortstop.

atbat.des: Denard Span singles on a line drive to center fielder Quincy Latimore.
Alexi Casilla hit by pitch. Denard Span to 2nd.
Justin Morneau doubles (1) on a fly ball to left fielder James Boone. Denard Span scores. Alexi Casilla scores.

action.des: Offensive Substitution: Pinch runner Brian Buscher replaces Justin Morneau.

atbat.des: Jason Kubel singles on a line drive to center fielder Quincy Latimore. Brian Buscher scores.
Joe Crede doubles (1) on a ground ball to left fielder James Boone. Jason Kubel to 3rd.

action.des: Offensive Substitution: Pinch runner Estarlin De Los Santos replaces Joe Crede.

atbat.des: Delmon Young reaches on fielding error by first baseman Larry Broadway. Jason Kubel scores. Estarlin De Los Santos scores. Throwing error by first baseman Larry Broadway.
Carlos Gomez flies out to center fielder Quincy Latimore.
Jose Morales flies out to left fielder James Boone.
Nick Punto grounds out, second baseman Ramon Vazquez to first baseman Larry Broadway.
